title: Observing Supernovae & Plotting a Light Curve

previous.title: Hubble Plot: A Matter of Perspective

content:
Can you find the supernova in this time-lapse? Click on the image where you think the supernova resides. Use the controls to play, pause, and skip forward and back.

Once you've found the supernova, data associated with the observations will populate the Light Curve graph. Click on a point on the Light Curve graph to learn more about that observation, and to skip to its associated image.
